chat_history.message:
Hello,
My iPhone 13 mini has the above problem:
I need to change the delivery name to T. Melih Görgün, that's the name on the door bell. Thank you.

Thank you for your help,

Dear ecomobile

Customer need to change the delivery name to T. Melih Görgün, that's the name on the doorbell. Thank you.

Regards,
Olga from the Back Care Team

Hello,

My iPhone 13 mini has the above problem.

Thank you for your help,

Dear Backcare,

Can we please confirm if the customer wishes to cancel the order?

Regards,
Xt

Hello,

Please send the device to the customer.

Cagin Kaya/  T. Melih Görgün
Manteuffelstraße 69
10999 Berlin
Deutschland
0532 414 34 47
kayacagin@gmail.com

He didn't want to cancel it.

Regards,
Aysah, Back Market

Dear Backcare,

We take note of the customer's request and have updated the shiping address. We will reprocess the order.

Regards,
RK

Dear Backcare,

We have shipped out the device to the customer.

Here is the tracking number: 1ZBF1560D901117592

Please note that as the courier has just picked up the parcel, it might take a while before it is accurately displayed on their website.

In the meantime please do not refund.

If you initiate a refund while the product is being shipped, we will lodge a case with SSC.

Regards,
HB

Hello,

The code is required for the customer to receive their package.

Can you send us the code?

Regards,
Aysah, Back Market

Dear Backcare,

I have contacted our logistics partner regarding this issue. I will update you once I have received the code. Thank you for your patience. 

Regards,
CH

Dear Backcare,

It seems that the customer has received their parcel. Attached is the POD.  Kindly close the case if no further assistance is required to avoid affecting the KPI of "Long Term Contact Rate". Please click the “close/to enclose” button located at the bottom right. Thank you.

Regards,
RK
